name: Gift Certificate - You Choose The Amount
description:
This is the perfect gift for the yarn or fiber lover in your life! Giving a gift certificate is simple for you and yet so very special for every recipient! Giving an ilashdesigns gift certificate is the perfect way to celebrate their love of their craft that they won't soon forget!

This listing is for one gift certificate in the amount you choose, and is redeemable here or at any of my online venues. For each gift certificate purchased a unique gift code will be generated and required for redemption. Preferred method of delivery of your Gift Certificate is email. You can leave those details - the recipients email address, or other contact information - in the "note to seller" in the Paypal payment screens (look below the fold, they hide it at the bottom of the screen) or send me an easy note here.

OPTIONS: You can choose to receive the gift certificate and code or it can be sent to your recipient via email or hard copy by USPS. Email or hard copy via snail mail notification includes gift certificate amount, gift code and the sender information on a small gift card and will also include my contact information, website addresses of my additional online shops and expiration date for redemption.

Gift certificates can be used for shipping costs. If the order or shipping costs exceed the amount of the gift certificate, an additional paypal payment will be required to cover the total costs.

Your recipient will receive the gift item, inside a mailer, wrapped in tissue paper and tied with handspun yarn perfectly ready for receiving or gift giving! Just let me know if you'd like a little note added to it and what you'd like me to write and I'd be happy to add that for you!

Gift certificates are valid for one year from date of purchase. They CAN be used in combination with other discount codes or promotions!! I am unable to honor them for custom orders at this time.

If you would like another denomination, please contact me and I will create a listing for you.

Thank you for considering an ilashdesigns Gift Certificate purchase. If you have any additional questions, please just ask.

Ready to ship items are in my Etsy shop - https://www.etsy.com/shop/ilashdesigns

name: Handspun Yarn - Discount Bundle - 3/$33
description:
This handspun thick and thin yarn is being offered in a discount bundle! When you purchase this listing you will receive three - 2 oz. skeins of my handspun yarn. The choice of colors and gauge are at my discretion depending on what I have available in my stock. I often times have a few extra here that were dyed when working on orders. You may possibly receive skeins that are all different gauges, and I often have one of a kind color ways as well.

You may enter in "note to seller" in the paypal payment screens (scroll to the bottom - it's hidden below the fold) your preference for boy or girl colors and I will accommodate the requests if I am able to. Or message me from this website. Feel free to contact me for a link to most all of the colorways I offer - I have many. You can't lose on this deal! I either LOVE the colorways or they are not in my shop. :)

Bundle specs:
Three 2 oz. skeins Ashland Bay merino or bfl wool
30 - 40 - 50 yard skeins, thick and thin or straights
This wool will felt.

On skeins of 40 yards+ the twist has been steam set. Gently support this yarn to handwash. Let soak 1/2 hour then squeeze tepid water thru using a mild soap. Rinse completely. Press out extra clean water on dry towels. Lay flat to air dry.

Check out my blog for free knit and crochet patterns http://ilashdesigns.wordpress.com/patterns-and-links/

I'm an avid Facebook member hosting contests, yarn give aways and updating daily you can follow me here http://ilashdesigns.wordpress.com/patterns-and-links/

**All of my items are created in a clean environment. Allergens are present in my fiber studio location and in most all of the items I create and I cannot guarantee any items to be allergen free.**

Thanks for stopping in! :)

Wiki on Yin and Yang:
Yang is the white side with the black dot on it, and yin is the black side with the white dot on it. The relationship between yin and yang is often described in terms of sunlight playing over a mountain and a valley. Yin (literally the 'shady place' or 'north slope') is the dark area occluded by the mountain's bulk, while yang (literally the 'sunny place' or 'south slope') is the brightly lit portion. As the sun moves across the sky, yin and yang gradually trade places with each other, revealing what was obscured and obscuring what was revealed.

Yin is characterized as slow, soft, yielding, diffuse, cold, wet, and passive; and is associated with water, earth, the moon, femininity and nighttime.

Yang, by contrast, is fast, hard, solid, focused, hot, dry, and aggressive; and is associated with fire, sky, the sun, masculinity and daytime.

name: Little Lamb Knit Bonnet Pattern
description:
This is an easy knit pattern. It takes some time because you need to be careful to not split the yarn when creating the curl stitch. I think it's a small sacrifice to make for this sweet. curly head piece.   Pattern includes video reference for the stitch needed to create the curls.

Difficulty: easy

YOU ARE PURCHASING A KNIT PATTERN ONLY; NOT A FINISHED PRODUCT

This pattern uses a 2 oz./40ish yard skein of my undyed merino handspun and about 10 yards of trim yarn. There is a link below to the yarn in my shop.

Newborn size only. Up to toddler size is in the process of being created.

here's the link in my shop of the yarn used for the body of the bonnet - http://www.ilashdesigns.net/product/handspun-thick-and-thin-art-yarn-undyed-merino-sale

You will receive your pattern by e-mail no more then 24 hours after your purchase. The pattern will be sent to your paypal e-mail unless you let me know differently.

This pattern is non-refundable.

Please do not copy and/or redistribute this pattern without my permission. You may create and sell as many of these hats as you desire.

name: Newborn Felted Hat Pattern
description:
This listing is for the knit PATTERN only.

This soft and sweet little hat is the dream photo prop! This hat is knit and then wet felted. Your ideas for embellishments are endless!

Size: Newborn

Supplies:
Yarn: Worsted weight 100% felt-able wool, under 50 yards.
Size 11 and 13 circular needles.
1 stitch marker
1 yarn needle

Skills:
Cast on, circular needle join, changing needle - basic beginner

This pattern is written with clear instructions counting your every stitch with you as you go.
Easy and FUN! :)

Your pattern will be emailed in pdf format to the email address connected with your paypal account, within 24 hours of your purchase. I send them as soon as I get notified and I check often. If you have another email address you would like me to send it to, please send me a convo.

Feel free to sell what you make! Thanks for shopping with me and I hope you have fun creating!

This pattern is non-refundable.
